attributes.action: Stop the Department of Health Withdrawing funding for HPV immunisations for all children not in Year 8
attributes.additional_details:
Reinstate funding for HPV immunisation for girls in Yrs 8-13 at school.

Croydon NHS have been told by the Department of Health, that they will not fund HPV Immunisation in any child not in year 8.  This vaccination was designed for children in years 8-13 at school, but now there is no funding, children are being turned away and told they can not have the immunisation.  Not all parents can afford the cost of £400 for the course of immunisations, and the Department of Health should put the future of the country first.  Prevention not cure.
